Select your Affiliates from the list below. You can search for your Affiliates by entering their contact name, company name, Affiliate number, email or SSN in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 Affiliates are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional Affiliates. New Affiliates can be added by clicking the "Add New Affiliate" link in the upper right hand corner of this page.
Company Name / Address
Email / Status / Authorized

CONTACT INFORMATION: If this is an individual, Enter your first name, last name, email and your Social Security Number. If this is for a Company, Enter the Company contact's first name, last name and email, Company name and the Company's Federal Tax ID Number.

LOGON / PASSWORD: Enter a unique Logon name and Password to be used to access your secured Affiliate Back Office. If a Logon Name and Password are not entered the system will generate a random Logon and Password and email them to you. The Logon name is also used to access your Sales Affiliate Website. For example if your Logon is "BigLance", Your personal sales Website can be accessed at BigLance.Pinnaclep.com
MAILING / SHIPPING ADDRESS: Enter a shipping address below if it is different from your mailing address. Shipments cannot be sent to a P.O. Box number.
COMMISSION PAYMENTS: Select the payment method for your sales commissions. If Electronic Check is selected, enter the appropriate information below.

Click on the name of each sales team Affiliate to view four levels of their sales team. As you click down the levels of your sales team, you can return back up by selecting the "Manager" link in the upper right hand corner of this page.

Upload Image File

Click the Browse button to select an image of yourself from your personal computer to display on your Sales Website. After you have selected the desired image file, click the Submit button to upload it to the Pinnacle system. The image file must be no larger than 15K in size and will be displayed 100 pixels wide.
